body:
Hello Avicus. My name is FileIce. I am new to avicus and i hope to play on this server with joy. I have been recently introduced to this server by some requests by friends and have played some avicus games. I have to say you guys strive hard to make these maps and i am very grateful to be playing on it ^ 

I hope to meet all of you in avicus and thanks :)
